name: Jessica
descriptions: Jessica is a resident of the Republic of Dave in 2277.

She is Dave's new younger wife and lives in the Republic of Dave. Her husband is a survivalist and has made sure his wife and older children know how to fight. Jessica is 24 and has never left the Republic; she fences but is extremely naive, conceited, and catty, especially when dealing with the first wife, Rosie.
Jessica appears in Fallout 3 and Fallout Shelter Online.

topics.response_text: Yeah, and I have to get back to work.

topics.topic_text: Actually, I think I have all the info I need.
You know, Rosie is running for president now.
topics.response_text: Poor girl doesn't stand much of a chance, does she?

topics.topic_text: Have you considered running for the presidency?
topics.response_text: No way!  You'd have to be crazy to run against him.

topics.topic_text: I'd like to discuss the election with you.
topics.response_text: I'll help you if I can.

topics.topic_text: You should go vote, if you haven't already.
I'd like to know more about the Republic.
topics.response_text: Rosie is dead. Can't honestly say I care very much.

topics.topic_text: That's all I need to know.
What's your take on the Republic?
topics.response_text: Dave is a great leader. He's going to bring civilization back to the Wasteland. One day, they'll say it all started here.

topics.topic_text: Tell me more about this Dave guy.
topics.response_text: That's President Dave to you, Wastelander. Call him by his full name, or we'll shoot you.
First wife! Rosie is the second wife, since she's the oldest and not good for anything anymore!

topics.topic: RDTopicYourselfWhat can you tell me about yourself?
topics.topic_text: Could you tell me more about yourself, Jessica?
topics.response_text: All I have to say is Dave is my husband. Mine, do you understand? I don't care what Rosie has to say about it.

conversation.response_text: Stay away from Dave. He's mine.
Or else what?  Yeah, thought so.
All done! Dave is the best!
